definition: To tilt or tip an object or container, often in a casual or careless manner, causing its contents to spill or fall out. It is commonly used to describe the action of accidentally or intentionally causing something to overturn or empty its contents.

examples.german: Er kippt den Müll in den Mülleimer.
examples.english: He dumps the trash into the garbage bin.

examples.german: Sie kippt das Wasser aus der Flasche.
examples.english: She pours out the water from the bottle.
The tree is about to topple over.

examples.german: Wir kippen den Sand in den Eimer.
examples.english: We pour the sand into the bucket.
